content.html: Well, I agree completely, but I don't think @maccaw is saying you should *reject* candidates if they *don't* have a GitHub. Rather, if they *do*, it's a great source of extra info about them. This is a good tip for candidates too.
content.value: Well, I agree completely, but I don't think @maccaw is saying you should *reject* candidates if they *don't* have a GitHub. Rather, if they *do*, it's a great source of extra info about them. This is a good tip for candidates too.
